summary: Syntax Highlighting for "PowerQuest PartitionMagic 7 Pro Scripting Files"
name: pqmagic.vim
description: Syntax Highlighting for "PowerQuest PartitionMagic 7 Pro Scripting Files"
install_details:
Copy the file to your vimfile/syntax directory.

Add the following line to your filetype.vim:

augroup filetypedetect
" PowerQuest PartitionMagic Pro Script File
au BufNewFile,BufRead *.pqs				setf pqmagic
augroup END
